roleset.name: to load someone/thing with too great a burden
roleset.note: OVERBURDEN-V NOTES: Frames file for 'overburden' based on dictionary.com. Verbnet entry 13.4.2. (from overburden.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: mule
example.text: John overburdened the mule with his collection of bottle caps and gum wrappers.
example.arg: his collection of bottle caps and gum wrappers
